thread.title: BRIEF-A10 Networks Announces Settlement Agreement With VIEX Capital Advisors

title: BRIEF-A10 Networks Announces Settlement Agreement With VIEX Capital Advisors

organizations.name: advisors reuters staff   a10 networks inc

text: March 16, 2018 / 11:45 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-A10 Networks Announces Settlement Agreement With VIEX Capital Advisors Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - A10 Networks Inc: * A10 NETWORKS ANNOUNCES SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT WITH VIEX CAPITAL ADVISORS * A10 NETWORKS INC - ‍PLANS TO DECLASSIFY BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND APPOINTS NEW BOARD MEMBER​ * A10 NETWORKS INC - ‍APPOINTED TOR BRAHAM TO ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS EFFECTIVE MARCH 14​ * A10 NETWORKS INC - ‍BOARD WILL SUBMIT A PROPOSAL TO DECLASSIFY BOARD OF DIRECTORS AT ITS 2018 ANNUAL MEETING​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
